title: Chemical synthesis of grafted cyclotides using a “plug and play” approach
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,567-571
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00008K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Johannes Koehbach, Edin Muratspahić, Zakaria M Ahmed, Andrew M White, Nataša Tomašević, Thomas Durek, Richard J Clark, Christian W Gruber, David J Craik
‘Plug and play’ grafting – a simple and convenient modular synthesis method to access complex cyclotide grafts and generate potent GPCR ligands is described.
